titleInfo.title: CBC High School Blind Game Football Team, 1944-1945

mods.abstract: The Christian Brothers College High School football team played Memphis Central High in the celebrated Blind Game. Central had been caught spying on CBC during its practices. E.H. Crump negotiated that honor would be settled in a game between the two teams to raise money for Lions Club charities. CBC team members were: Standing (L-R): Harry Costello, Thomas Mulroy, P. Turner Kneeling (L-R): James "Red" Doyle, William Dulwebber, Albert Huebner, Percy Roberts, Marcus Folis, William Burke, George Whitehead, Joseph Smith
